benchmark_details.name: SWE-Factory (Your Automated Factory for Issue Resolution Training Data and Evaluation Benchmarks)
benchmark_details.overview: We propose SWE-Factory, an automatic benchmark construction pipeline for the GitHub issue resolution task, which automates the construction of high-quality GitHub issue resolution datasets through multi-agent framework and exit-code-based methods.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide an automatic pipeline for constructing GitHub issue resolution benchmarks with minimal manual intervention.

data.source: Collected from GitHub issues and repositories using automated processes.
data.annotation: Automated validation and grading using exit codes.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on manual inspection and automated validation.
methodology.interpretation: High Valid Rate and Success Rate indicate effective construction of benchmark instances.
methodology.baseline_results: SWE-Factory successfully constructs 269 valid benchmark instances out of 671 issues.
methodology.validation: Validation through exit-code-based tests before and after applying patches.
